languages.text: "Я, кстати, предупреждал, что так будет, если вы не окажете нам помощь провизией. Когда Чорда заявилась к нам, мы сопротивлялись ее диктатуре, но с каждым днем ряды преданных мне партнеров таяли. В итоге станции хватило одного хорошего удара по зубам, чтобы она легла на брюхо и запросила пощады. Сопротивляться решили немногие".

traits.locale_text: "Я, кстати, предупреждал, что так будет, если вы не окажете нам помощь провизией. Когда Чорда заявилась к нам, мы сопротивлялись ее диктатуре, но с каждым днем ряды преданных мне партнеров таяли. В итоге станции хватило одного хорошего удара по зубам, чтобы она легла на брюхо и запросила пощады. Сопротивляться решили немногие".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "And I warned you, didn't I, that this would happen unless you helped us with provisions? When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."
languages.original_text: "Я, кстати, предупреждал, что так будет, если вы не окажете нам помощь провизией. Когда Чорда заявилась к нам, мы сопротивлялись ее диктатуре, но с каждым днем ряды преданных мне партнеров таяли. В итоге станции хватило одного хорошего удара по зубам, чтобы она легла на брюхо и запросила пощады. Сопротивляться решили немногие".

When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我已经警告过您了，如果您不为我们提供补给，就会发生这种事情，是这样吧？库尔达刚出现的时候，我们确实反抗过她的独裁统治，但我忠实的伙伴却越来越少。到了最后，库尔达一记重拳打在这座星站上。落脚港跪在她面前，乖乖求饶，已经没什么人再敢反抗她了。”
languages.original_text: "And I warned you, didn't I, that this would happen unless you helped us with provisions? When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

traits.locale_text: “我已经警告过您了，如果您不为我们提供补给，就会发生这种事情。当库尔达出现的时候，我们一开始确实反抗过她的独裁统治，但我忠实的伙伴却越来越少。到了最后，库尔达一记重拳打在这座星站上，落脚港跪在她面前，乖乖求饶。已经没什么人再敢反抗她了。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「君には警告しただろ？供給の手伝いをしない限り、こうなるとな。チョーダが現れた時、独裁政治に立ち向かったが、忠実な仲間の数は日に日に減っていった。最終的にステーションの奴らは、歯に一発パンチを食らっただけで許しを請う事になった。抵抗できる者はほとんどいない」
languages.original_text: "And I warned you, didn't I, that this would happen unless you helped us with provisions? When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

traits.locale_text: 「君には警告しただろ？供給の手伝いをしない限り、こうなるとな。チョーダが現れた時、独裁政治に立ち向かったが、忠実な仲間の数は日に日に減っていった。最終的にステーションの奴らは、歯に一発パンチを食らっただけで許しを請う事になった。抵抗できる者はほとんどいない」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Y se lo advertí, que esto ocurriría a menos que nos ayudara con provisiones. Cuando Chorda apareció, nos enfrentamos a su dictadura, pero las filas de mis compañeros se hacían más pequeñas cada día. Al final, bastó un puñetazo en los dientes para que la estación se diera la vuelta y pidiera clemencia. Pocos eran capaces de resistir».
languages.original_text: "And I warned you, didn't I, that this would happen unless you helped us with provisions? When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

traits.locale_text: «Y se lo advertí, que esto ocurriría a menos que nos ayudara con provisiones. Cuando Chorda apareció, nos enfrentamos a su dictadura, pero las filas de mis compañeros se hacían más pequeñas cada día. Al final, bastó un puñetazo en los dientes para que la estación se diera la vuelta y pidiera clemencia. Pocos eran capaces de resistir».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Und ich habe Euch gewarnt, oder etwa nicht, dass das geschehen würde, wenn Ihr uns nicht mit Vorräten aushelft? Als Chorda hier aufgetaucht ist, haben wir uns gegen ihre Diktatur aufgelehnt, doch die Reihen meiner loyalen Verbündeten haben sich von Tag zu Tag mehr gelichtet. Letztlich hat ein einziger ordentlicher Schlag in die Zähne ausgereicht, damit die Station sich auf dem Boden zusammenrollt und um Gnade fleht. Kaum jemand hat die Kraft gefunden, Widerstand zu leisten."
languages.original_text: "And I warned you, didn't I, that this would happen unless you helped us with provisions? When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich habe Euch gewarnt, oder etwa nicht, dass das geschehen würde, wenn Ihr uns nicht mit Vorräten aushelft. Als Chorda hier aufgetaucht ist, haben wir uns gegen ihre Diktatur aufgelehnt, doch die Reihen meiner loyalen Verbündeten haben sich von Tag zu Tag mehr gelichtet. Letztlich hat ein einziger ordentlicher Schlag in die Zähne ausgereicht, damit die Station sich auf dem Boden zusammenrollt und um Gnade fleht. Kaum jemand hat die Kraft gefunden, Widerstand zu leisten."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « D'ailleurs, je vous avais dit que ça arriverait si vous ne nous fournissiez pas de provisions. Quand Chorda est arrivée, nous nous sommes rebellés contre sa tyrannie, mais les rangs de mes partenaires ont fondu comme neige au soleil. Finalement, il a suffi d'un bon coup de poing dans les dents pour que la station s'avoue vaincue et supplie qu'on l'épargne. Peu ont eu le cran de résister. »
languages.original_text: "And I warned you, didn't I, that this would happen unless you helped us with provisions? When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

traits.locale_text: « D'ailleurs, je vous avais dit que ça arriverait si vous ne nous fournissiez pas de provisions. Quand Chorda est arrivée, nous nous sommes rebellés contre sa tyrannie, mais les rangs de mes partenaires ont fondu comme neige au soleil. Finalement, il a suffi d'un bon coup de poing dans les dents pour que la station s'avoue vaincue et supplie qu'on l'épargne. Peu ont eu le cran de résister. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Fakat sizi uyarmıştım, değil mi? Erzak yardımı almazsak böyle olacağını söylememiş miydim? Chorda tepemize bindiğinde diktatörlüğüne karşı koyduk ancak sadık ortaklarım, günbegün azalıp yitti. Sonra da ağzının üstüne okkalı bir yumruk yiyen istasyon sakinleri, çabucak merhamet dilenmeye başladı. Direnmeye gözü yiyenlerin sayısı çok azdı."
languages.original_text: "And I warned you, didn't I, that this would happen unless you helped us with provisions? When Chorda showed up here, we stood up to her dictatorship, but the ranks of my loyal partners thinned by the day. In the end, a single good punch in the teeth was all it took for the station to roll over and beg for mercy. Few found it in them to resist."

traits.locale_text: "Ama sizi uyarmıştım, değil mi? Erzak yardımı almazsak böyle olacağını söylememiş miydim? Chorda tepemize bindiğinde diktatörlüğüne karşı koyduk. Fakat sadık ortaklarım günbegün azalıp yitti. Sonra da ağzının üstüne okkalı bir yumruk yiyen istasyon sakinleri çabucak merhamet dilenmeye başladı. Direnmeye gözü yiyenlerin sayısı çok azdı."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
